title: Pre season is awful
body:
the blame game is real (and I am guilty of it too) as everyone is getting used to the changes.

ranked is no fun at all for me right now.

replies.body:
I admit this new update introduced a lot of changes that I currently am a bit sceptical about, but like all patches I'll get used to it.

It's weird, but stay strong my friend. Look forward to new season ranked bc that's the best time to ranked again.
Marksman are (still) boring. Waiting on new Poppy and Mage changes. The new skins are...ok I guess. Not getting my cash I think, however.

zeds still good LOL. the new items r pretty good on him. id go serrated dirk first back then tiamat, finish ghostblade. go side lanes and get free kills l0l. ghost blade is 40 sec cd now and u dont have to sell it late game.

They didn't ruin the game in the slightest. I can agree with you, having quite a liking for Zed, that I can feel the difference of the shurikens, but the new items are exactly what a Zed would want. The new Phantom Dancer is the ultimate 1v1 item, and Zed excels at 1v1ing, this is just a buff for him. Not to mention items like Death's Dance and the new Yoummu's are excellent on him (first-hand experience). They may have nerfed his kit, but made up for it with his build.
